testcase.name: Successful submision of Product to Checkout Bag for Custom Made Suit
testcase.system-out: Given User has selected product "Suit" from the custom made section in suitsupply website.passed When User provides fabric details as "Grey Plain Wool;586.861/122"..........passed And User provides fit details as "Lazio - Single Breasted;Brescia"..........passed And User provides turn up details as "With Turn Up".........................passed And User provides waistband details as "Belt Loops".........................passed And User provides waistcoat details as "Capetown"...........................passed And User provides additional trousers detail as "No"........................passed And User provides size details as "Regular;46;Regular;44"...................passed Then User is able to add the product to bag.................................passed
